Author: almasya#0676
Content: uno, all KMD ecosystem privkeys are "strings without spaces and start with U"         start from "U", but at the second address I received another answer "U" to the request, both addresses of ONE wallet. It's right?

Author: gcharang#6833
Content:
yes, native mode has a file called `wallet.dat` which holds multiple addresses
please read: https://support.komodoplatform.com/en/support/solutions/articles/29000025198-how-to-backup-restore-komodo-or-assetchain-wallet-dat if you haven't already @almasya 
every address starts with `R` every privatekey starts with `U`
